translation_en: When the sky has split [open]
translation_id: Apabila langit terbelah

transliteration_en: Wa azinat li Rabbihaa wa huqqat
translation_en: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so]
translation_id: serta patuh kepada Tuhannya dan sudah semestinya patuh.

translation_en: And when the earth has been extended
translation_id: Apabila bumi diratakan,

transliteration_en: Wa alqat maa feehaa wa takhallat
transliteration_id: Wa alqat mā fīhā wa takhallat.
translation_en: And has cast out that within it and relinquished [it]
translation_id: memuntahkan apa yang ada di dalamnya dan menjadi kosong,

transliteration_en: Wa azinat li Rabbihaa wa huqqat
translation_en: And has responded to its Lord and was obligated [to do so] -
translation_id: serta patuh kepada Tuhannya, dan sudah semestinya patuh.

arabic: يٰٓاَيُّهَا الْاِنْسَانُ اِنَّكَ كَادِحٌ اِلٰى رَبِّكَ كَدْحًا فَمُلٰقِيْهِۚ
transliteration_en: Yaaa ayyuhal insaanu innaka kaadihun ilaa Rabbika kad han famulaaqeeh
transliteration_id: Yā ayyuhal-insānu innaka kādiḥun ilā rabbika kadḥan fa mulāqīh(i).
translation_en: O mankind, indeed you are laboring toward your Lord with [great] exertion and will meet it.
translation_id: Wahai manusia, sesungguhnya engkau telah bekerja keras menuju (pertemuan dengan) Tuhanmu. Maka, engkau pasti menemui-Nya.

transliteration_en: Fa ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo biyameenih
transliteration_id: Fa ammā man ūtiya kitābahū biyamīnih(ī).
translation_en: Then as for he who is given his record in his right hand,
translation_id: Adapun orang yang catatannya diberikan dari sebelah kanannya,

translation_en: He will be judged with an easy account
translation_id: dia akan dihisab dengan pemeriksaan yang mudah

translation_en: And return to his people in happiness.
translation_id: dan dia akan kembali kepada keluarganya (yang sama-sama beriman) dengan gembira.

arabic: وَاَمَّا مَنْ اُوْتِيَ كِتٰبَهٗ وَرَاۤءَ ظَهْرِهٖۙ
transliteration_en: Wa ammaa man ootiya kitaabahoo waraaa'a zahrih
transliteration_id: Wa ammā man ūtiya kitābahū warā'a ẓahrih(ī).
translation_en: But as for he who is given his record behind his back,
translation_id: Adapun orang yang catatannya diberikan dari belakang punggungnya,

translation_en: He will cry out for destruction
translation_id: dia akan berteriak, “Celakalah aku!”

translation_en: And [enter to] burn in a Blaze.
translation_id: Dia akan memasuki (neraka) Sa‘ir (yang menyala-nyala).

translation_en: Indeed, he had [once] been among his people in happiness;
translation_id: Sesungguhnya dia dahulu (di dunia) bergembira di kalangan keluarganya (yang sama-sama kafir).

translation_en: Indeed, he had thought he would never return [to Allah].
translation_id: Sesungguhnya dia mengira bahwa dia tidak akan kembali (kepada Tuhannya).

arabic: بَلٰىۛ اِنَّ رَبَّهٗ كَانَ بِهٖ بَصِيْرًاۗ
transliteration_en: Balaaa inna Rabbahoo kaana bihee baseeraa
transliteration_id: Balā, inna rabbahū kāna bihī baṣīrā(n).
translation_en: But yes! Indeed, his Lord was ever of him, Seeing.
translation_id: Tidak demikian. Sesungguhnya Tuhannya selalu melihatnya.

translation_en: So I swear by the twilight glow
translation_id: Aku bersumpah demi cahaya merah pada waktu senja,

translation_en: And [by] the night and what it envelops
translation_id: demi malam dan apa yang diselubunginya,

translation_en: And [by] the moon when it becomes full
translation_id: dan demi bulan apabila jadi purnama,

translation_en: [That] you will surely experience state after state.
translation_id: sungguh, kamu benar-benar akan menjalani tingkat demi tingkat (dalam kehidupan).

translation_en: So what is [the matter] with them [that] they do not believe,
translation_id: Maka, mengapa mereka tidak mau beriman?

arabic: وَاِذَا قُرِئَ عَلَيْهِمُ الْقُرْاٰنُ لَا يَسْجُدُوْنَ ۗ ۩
transliteration_en: Wa izaa quri'a 'alaihimul Quraanu laa yasjudoon
translation_en: And when the Qur'an is recited to them, they do not prostrate [to Allah]?
translation_id: Apabila Al-Qur’an dibacakan kepada mereka, mereka tidak (mau) bersujud,

translation_en: But those who have disbelieved deny,
translation_id: bahkan orang-orang yang kufur itu mendustakan(-nya).

translation_en: And Allah is most knowing of what they keep within themselves.
translation_id: Allah lebih mengetahui apa yang mereka sembunyikan (dalam hati mereka).

translation_en: So give them tidings of a painful punishment,
translation_id: Maka, berilah mereka kabar ‘gembira’ dengan azab yang pedih,

arabic: اِلَّا الَّذِيْنَ اٰمَنُوْا وَعَمِلُوا الصّٰلِحٰتِ لَهُمْ اَجْرٌ غَيْرُ مَمْنُوْنٍ ࣖ
transliteration_en: Illal lazeena aamanoo wa 'amilus saalihaati lahum ajrun ghairu mamnoon
transliteration_id: Illal-lażīna āmanū wa ‘amiluṣ-ṣāliḥāti lahum ajrun gairu mamnūn(in).
translation_en: Except for those who believe and do righteous deeds. For them is a reward uninterrupted.
translation_id: Kecuali orang-orang yang beriman dan mengerjakan kebajikan. Bagi merekalah pahala yang tidak putus-putus.
